synopsis.text: Riki's silver-furred pup, Gin, is born with a destiny etched in his coat - to become a formidable bear-hunting dog. Tragedy strikes when the fearsome demon bear Akakabuto slays Riki, leaving Gin with a burning desire for vengeance. Gin embarks on a journey across Japan, seeking powerful canine allies to aid him in his quest to defeat the tyrannical Akakabuto and restore peace to the Futago Pass. As the demon bear gathers his own forces, Gin must grow into a strong and loyal pack leader, for only then can he hope to bring justice to his father and end the reign of terror.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
